a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Renewable energy consumption measured in terawatt-hours (TWh) per year. Traditional biomass refers to the
consumption of fuelwood, forestry products, animal and agricultural wastes.
Data source: Energy Institute Statistical Review of World Energy (2023); Vaclav Smil (2017)
